programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Together, the kids use their creativity to create a drawing depicting Barney and themselves having a blast playing baseball. After playing a game of imaginary baseball, they bring Barney into the fun. After accidentally hurting BJ's feelings by forgetting to add him to the drawing, Barney and the children learn what it takes to be a good friend. BJ realizes he has many friends and enjoys a day playing with Barney and the children.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney and the kids explore the wonderful world of counting by playing a variety of fun games, like Barney may I? Barney and the kids help Baby Bop learn how to count to 10 by including her in games, and by taking her on a make-believe shopping trip in the caboose.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney helps Baby Bop and the children discover big and little things in the world around them. When Nick expresses his concern about being the smallest among the kids, Barney steps in to demonstrate how each person's unique size holds its own usefulness. When the group heads out to the park, they begin a creative retelling of Jack and the Beanstalk. Barney and his friends discover everyone is special, regardless of size.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: The children are excited to show Barney all the international flags they are hanging throughout the Caboose, in preparation for the International Fair in the playground later that day. The children learn all about many different countries, including Brazil and Kenya. They learn about the clothing worn by local people, the fascinating animals that live in each land and they also partake in various activities they might join in other countries around the world.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: A make-believe neighborhood in the caboose prompts Barney to teach the kids all about different community helpers. The kids explore all the different roles people have in the community that help them live safely and happily, including doctors, police officers, and teachers. The kids realize its great to celebrate the different ways people help others!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Nick announces to the group that he has a workbook assignment for school to fill out, which involves finding as many squares as he can around the park. Barney decided this is a great opportunity for him and the other kids to join in, and its great fun when Barney and the kids can help a friend!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney and the children have fun playing with toy cars. They take this opportunity to learn about buses and cars, including all the mechanics inside that make them similar. After learning about different kinds of vehicles they may see on the roads, the kids build a bus to take them to their favorite neighborhood spots.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When Nick accidentally gets white paint on Sarahs picture, the children must find a way to deal with their emotions. Barney helps his young friends find good ways to express and deal with angry and negative emotions.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Sword in the Sandbox - A Storybook Adventure
programme.desc: Daniel fails miserably when he tries to join the others in jump rope. Convinced that he's too little to do anything right, Barney tells him the story of The Sword in the Sandbox. Through the legend of King Arthur, Daniel learns there are many things he can do... if he tries hard enough.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.sub-title: Riff to the Rescue! - A Wild West Adventure
programme.desc: When Riff is asked to be captain of a baseball team, he doesnt think he can do it. But Barney gives him the courage to try, by recounting the tale of his great-great-grandfather Riffle the Wild West hero!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.sub-title: Lights! Camera! Action! - A Movie Adventure
programme.desc: Melanie comes up with the perfect idea to get people to donate to Grace's food drive - put on a movie premiere in the caboose! Barney and friends pitch in to help, but they all have different ideas about what kind of movie to make. Everything they try falls apart. It's curtains for Melanie's movie until she comes up with a blockbuster idea of her own.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.sub-title: To Catch a Thief - A Mystery Adventure
programme.desc: Detective BJ is on the case when several sports balls suddenly disappear. Determined to find the mysterious ball thief, BJ falsely accuses Riff of being the thief. BJ learns he cannot jump to conclusions and must find the whole story to see who the thief really is.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Magic Lamp - A Travel Adventure
programme.desc: Celebrating her birthday in the park with friends, Layla is more interested in hot dogs than her mother's Middle Eastern food. When Barney reads the story of Aladdin and the Magic Lamp, Layla is transported to a Middle Eastern marketplace where she learns different cultures have many exciting foods and customs to offer.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Amazing Captain Pickles - A Hero Adventure
programme.desc: Captain Pickles and Wonder Princess both wanted to be the super-est superheroes. When Captain Pickles said he could jump over the moon, everyone wanted to see. BJ knew he couldn't really jump that high, but he could jump high enough to save Emma's balloon. Everyone was proud of him, even if he couldn't jump over the moon. BJ was a hero.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.sub-title: A Game for Everyone - A Sports Adventure
programme.desc: Barney comes up with the idea to have a sports day in the park. All day, they play games like soccer and hopscotch among others, all for fun. Meanwhile, Baby Bop meets a girl with special needs named Jill, as well as her mom. As Baby Bop gets to know Jill more, she encourages her to play hopscotch with the others. In the end, Baby Bop and Jill win the trophy for hopscotch and she and her mother leave.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Reluctant Dragon - A Fairy Tale Adventure
programme.desc: After the kids judge a spider by its creepy looks, Barney tells them the story of The Reluctant Dragon where a shepherd became friends with a dragon, who was judged by her appearance.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop's friend Monty the butterfly passes through the park with a flock of friends on their way to Mexico. When Monty gets left behind, Barney takes everyone on a visit to Mexico to return Monty to his insect friends and family and give Baby Bop the chance to say goodbye to her butterfly friend.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney's excited to find out that Rusty's family is adopting a new baby sister from China; however, Rusty's not sure if he's going to be a good brother, and he doesn't know much about China. Barney shows Rusty and the others some info China on the computer and BJ and Baby Bop talk about siblings. Through Barney's Travel Book, Barney takes Rusty, BJ and Baby Bop on an adventure to China where he can learn more about his new sister's heritage. When they get there, the people are celebrating Chinese New Year. From lion dances and talented performers to tasty treats, making lanterns and puppet shows, the celebration never runs out of fun. By the time he returns to the park, Rusty excitedly meets his new baby sister, named Mei Ling, and realizes he will be the best big brother ever.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Ben is late to the park and is disappointed to realize he missed his chance at riding a real pony. He has waited his whole life for this, and now it looks as if hes missed his opportunity. Luckily, Barney takes Ben to Spain where they meet Regalo, a dancing horse with Riff and Baby Bop. Ben and Barney return to the park just in time for him to ride the pony after all! Ben is thrilled to ride a horse and learned an important lesson about patience and waiting.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Emma is stuck with a school project and can't play soccer with Joshua. Having to interview her parents and get info about an interesting ancestor, she is frustrated with the assignment. Barney helps her discover that her ancestors were from Venice, Italy. Using his Travel Book, Barney takes Joshua, Emma, and Riff to Venice, Italy. He gives his friends a gondola ride as well as telling them about famous explorer Marco Polo. Barney's friend, Anna Maria tells Emma that she knew her great grandfather and takes her to his shop, where they try on masks and make some of their own. Emma learns that if she makes the mask in parts, she'll get it done. Barney reminds her of this lesson, so she will do the same for her school project.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney, Baby Bop, and BJ are helping the kids get ready for a school play. Barney tells everyone that putting on shows began in Greece. Of course, the little dinos and kids want to visit the country, so off they go! While there, they meet some friends and decide to put on a play in an amphitheatre. Barney knows a great story that originated in Greece called King Midas. By the end of the day, everyone has learned that wanting too much is not a good thing, especially BJ!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When Ben accidentally includes Kioko's prized music box from Switzerland in a cardboard box of yard sale items-the music box is sold! Kioko is sad and Ben wants to make things right, so he and Barney travel to Switzerland in search of a replacement gift. While there, they sample Swiss food, customs and games-but no music box! Luckily when Ben returns the music box is returned!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Nick shows Barney and the rest of the kids his number cards that he and his mom had put together. He doesn't really think they're fun at first. But Barney helps his friends discover just how fun numbers can be by taking them on a number hunt in the park. With Barney and his friends, you can always count on a fun day!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.sub-title: A Wonderful World of Colors and Shapes
programme.desc: Picture this! When Barney shows off his new painting, his friends are inspired to create their own art show. Discovering how to create new colors and draw shapes, Barney and his friends put on a super-dee-duper art show

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When Baby Bop uses the caboose mailbox to deliver a special invitation to her tea party, she discovers that no one can read her handwriting. Barney and his friends find creative ways to help her learn her ABCs so she can spell her name!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney's friends are playing a fun game of I Can Do where they each share something they can do. When BJ suggests having an I Can Do show, Baby Bop becomes worried. Barney shows Baby Bop that while trying something new can sometimes be scary, with help from family and friends, it can also be fun!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Welcome to the neighborhood! Anna has just moved to the neighborhood and is missing her old friends. Barney and his friends help her discover that moving is an adventure with new places to explore and new friends to meet.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Safety first! After learning about fire safety when firefighter Bill visits the caboose, Barney and his friends are inspired to do a little safety inspection of their own. BJ's accident shows why you should only skate outside, and saying be careful is a good way to tell someone how much you love them!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney and his friends have a wheel good fun day learning about cars. Barney creates a colorful, kid-size car, the dinos learn about seatbelt safety, and everyone discovers there are many different styles of cars.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.sub-title: My Friends, The Doctor and Dentist
programme.desc: Time for a check-up! Barney helps his friends discover the world of doctors and dentists as they learn about healthy habits like brushing teeth, getting checkups, eating healthy foods and getting exercise.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney has a tee-rific surprise for BJ and Baby Bop. Cousin Riff is moving to town! Riff amazes everyone with his awesome musical abilities. When Barney suggests that they put on a show, Riff becomes shy - he's never performed in a show before. With encouragement from Barney, Riff joins in and does what he knows best - making music!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ brings his brand-new toy plane to the park. Riff borrows the plane while BJ is off playing. Unfortunately, curiosity gets the best of Riff and he ends up taking the plane apart to see how it works. Luckily, BJ isnt mad when he finds out. Instead, he shows Riff how to put the plane back together again. Baby Bop is having a great time playing with her homemade boat. However, what she really wants is to ride in a big boat. Barney takes her to look at boats on the computer while BJ and Riff work on a big surprise for her. When Barney and Baby Bop return to the playground, they discover that BJ and Riff have built a sailing ship on the playset for Baby Bop!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop is sad because she lost her pet caterpillar, Monty. Barney and the others try to help her find it. Baby Bop is surprised to discover Monty inside a chrysalis. Everyone is excited to find Monty now a beautiful butterfly! Barney and Baby Bop are thrilled when BJ sets up a bug zoo in the caboose, but Riff isnt so sure he wants to be around bugs. When the park is magically transformed into a amphitheatre with performing insects, Riff discovers that bugs dont bug him after all.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop, BJ and the children prepare for the Shapes Carnival in the park. Riff knows he will do well at the carnival because he is wearing his lucky medal. When he loses the medal, Riff is afraid he wont be able to play the games. With Barneys guidance, Riff has fun playing the games and he realizes he didnt need his lucky medal play and have fun. When it starts to rain at the park, Baby Bop joins Barney and BJ inside the caboose. Baby Bop pokes her head out to see if the rain has stopped and spies a beautiful rainbow in the sky! When the others come to see itits gone. Baby Bop is very disappointed because she liked all the pretty colors, so Barney and the others paint their own life-sized rainbow. When it starts to rain again, the homemade rainbow falls down and gets all wet. Luckily, a real rainbow takes its place!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: An ordinary game of hide and seek takes a not-so-ordinary turn when Baby Bop claims that an elephant is hiding in the park! Barney and Riff are happy to play along, but BJ thinks that his sister may be seeing things. Fortunately, Barney takes this opportunity to help the young dinos learn about their sense of sight while having tons of fun! BJ and Riff engage in a friendly contest to see which of them can find (or make) the loudest sound in the park. The playful competition continues to escalateand along the way, the sounds of animals, musical instruments, and even fire engines are introduced.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Riff has many special qualities, but sometimes, his shyness makes it hard for him to meet new friends. When Barney introduces Riff to some of his friends in the park, its Baby Bop that ends up feeling less-than-special as the kids seem more impressed with Riff and his special talents. Barney helps Baby Bop realize that theres more to being special than the things you can do. The way you feel and the way you make others feel makes you special, too. Its a special day in the park as Barney and the little dinosaurs enjoy an Art Festival. BJ and Riff share some musical art and Baby Bop shares a painting of a very special friendBarney! As the festival comes to an end, Barney reminds his friends everywhere that no matter what kind of art they make, its always special when it comes from their hearts!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When some of the children in the park invite Barney to join them for a race, BJ and Baby Bop decide hell need their help. They show him several ways to get ready for the big race by warming up and stretching. By the end of the day, everyone finds out that there are many fun ways to exercise. When BJ starts to feel sick after eating too many sweets, he lies down in hopes of feeling better. He has a dream about a snack fantasyland where he eats as many sweets as he wants and ends up with a big stomachache. When he wakes up, hes happy to find out it was only a dream. When he asks for a healthy snack, his friends are happy to oblige.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ and Riff find a pirate map, but in order to find the treasure, they have to be able to count. Since Baby Bop has not learned to count yet, Barney offers to help teach her so she can participate. In the end, Baby Bop learns to count and realizes that feeling good about herself is the greatest treasure in the world! Its time for a music concert in the park. As Riff works on his one-man band, the others make posters for the show. Everyone enjoys Riffs calypso rendition of a favorite song, and they all enjoy helping each other.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: After an abundance of mail arrives at the Caboose for Barney, the kids realize it must be a very special day. Its Barneys birthday! Barneys friends along with Baby Bop and BJ, put together a stupendous party celebration for him in the park, including decorations and cake galore!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney, BJ and the kids spend the day preparing for a very special performance for their friends in the park. They all gather in the caboose to prepare for a stupendous night of singing, dancing, and magical fun.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Sarah and Tony create a beautiful birdhouse to place out in the park. They are happy to learn that the birds will have lots of company; many other animals make their homes in the park too! Barney and the kids travel around the park, noticing and discussing all the various animals that call the park home.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: The children realize its normal to experience all different types of emotions. With Barneys help, the children learn all about how to handle how they are feeling, especially feeling happy, sad, and angry.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: After creating a friends and family tree for a school project, the children discuss all the people in their lives they care about. This provides a perfect opportunity for Barney and his friends to learn about love and relationships.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: A fun day in the park with friends involves a musical rhythm clapping game. Barney introduces a new game that helps reinforce learning about music, rhythm, and musical instruments. This new found inspiration causes the kids to make their very own marching band.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Its a great day to move around in the park! Barney and his friends have fun with creative movement, while learning new dances, having races, and acting out a story. These activities teach the kids how they can move their bodies while doing different activities.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: A mysterious paper airplane flies into the park, inspiring the children to talk about all things Airplanes! The children let their creativity fly when they use their imaginations to build their very own airplane.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: The possibilities are endless as Barney and the kids use their imagination to bring their drawings to life. Barney and the children have an island adventure by imagining themselves in Lauras picture, transporting them to a sunny island!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Celebrate the things that make us special! Barney and his friends discover that trying something new can be fun. Jackson treats everyone to his healthy but unusual snack, while Baby Bop has a special picnic for BJ consisting mostly of her favorite foods.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Oh baby! Oh baby! David has a new baby brother and is now a big brother. But David doesnt know what a big brother is supposed to do and isnt sure hes ready. Barney and his friends help David learn about new babies and how to be a big brother.
